mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID , CONCAT(E.FIRST_NAME, ' ' || E.LAST_NAME) AS EMPLOYEE_NAME , CONCAT(E.EMAIL, '@emp.com') AS EMAIL , J.JOB_TITLE , E.JOB_ID , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME , E.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{id}

SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID , CONCAT(E.FIRST_NAME, ' ' || E.LAST_NAME) AS EMPLOYEE_NAME , CONCAT(E.EMAIL, '@emp.com') AS EMAIL , J.JOB_TITLE , E.JOB_ID , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME , E.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID ORDER BY E.EMPLOYEE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID
SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID AS empId , PHONE_NUMBER AS phone , HIRE_DATE AS hireDate , SALARY AS salary , COMMISSION_PCT AS commission , MANAGER_ID AS mngId FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{id}
